name: Beach Ball (Theotis)
description:
Beach Ball

This game was made for the Mini Jam 108.

Don't let the ball fall to the ground! That simple!

  • Use the right and left arrows or A and D to move and don't let the ball fall to the ground. 
  • When you pass each round, the checkpoint is saved in case you die. 
  • When the ball hits the ground, you restart the round. 
  • If you go back to the title screen, you lose the save and go back to round 1.
  • If you die, the score is reset.
